item.title: Oracle, Microsoft Reportedly in Talks With WH to Buy TikTok
item.description: Oracle and Microsoft are reportedly in talks with the White House to take over the China-based TikTok app, reports NPR.

item.title: Trump: Tariffs Made US So Much Money
item.description: President Donald Trump during a visit to Las Vegas touted the tariff system, saying it "made so much money."
